page.title: 14TOURISM
page.content: Tourism is the major industry of the area.There are 21 holiday sites situated in the block,and Caravan parks are the most common.These cater for both permanent (i.e more than 1 week) holiday makers in addition to passing tourist trade.They range in size from half an acre to 50 acres.With the exception of the two smallest sites,all the centres have facilities for shopping,food and entertainment.Only three have direct access to the shoreline,and two are by means of a bridge across the railway line.The largest site (se next page) has an average passing population of 50,00 per season.The season extends from late May to early October,the peak weeks being in late July and early August.
